column2: The Celts of Gaul were renowned for there excelent cavalry tactics and were often hired on as mercenaries. They even formed the core of the Roman Empire's cavalry regiments for several hundred years. This is where the new breed of Gaulish heavy cavalry are trained.

For quite some time now you have watched the steady decline of [Root.Religion.GetName]. No longer can you sit idly by while your people suffer at the hands of zealots and madmen of [Root.Religion.GetName]. From now on you will lead your people back to the teachings of your forefathers!

column2:
One of the following must be true:
- The §YMoral Authority§! of your religion must be below §R20§!
- There must be a pagan province in your demesne that is relevant to your culture, in addition to the §YMoral Authority§! of your religion being below §R30§!
- You must be a lunatic and the §YMoral Authority§! of you religion must be below §R50§!
